summary: Adds plenty of variety to the repetitive loading screens by adding lots of new ones with new models, plus making use of lots other nifs left out in the vanilla game, plus adds new helpful hints and lore.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3782/9284553513_05044e74f6_o.png[/img][/center]

[color=#b22222][font=times new roman,times,serif][size=7][u][b]Description[/b][/u][/size][/font][/color]
Adds lots of new loadscreens (currently over 100) using both previously unused vanilla models and new models for added variety, which also come with plenty of new text including helpful hints and lore.
Some loadscreens will only appear in certain areas, and some special ones have been set up to appear only after completing quests relating to them.
I also found a horse with rider model that was not used, instead a paint horse was used twice for some reason which I fixed.
Check the screens on the mod page to get a better idea of what to expect including my own custom made statics using vanilla assets
FYI everything sticks to original lore with no mention of modding or anything else outside the game.
[color=#b22222][font=times new roman,times,serif][size=7][u][b]Installation[/b][/u][/size][/font][/color]
Place the files into your data folder. Load order isn\'t an issue as all my screens have been designed not to conflict or be read before/after other mods.
[color=#b22222][font=times new roman,times,serif][size=7][u][b]Compatibility[/b][/u][/size][/font][/color]
Yep! Compatible with everything, don\'t worry about it :D
[color=#b22222][font=times new roman,times,serif][size=7][u][b]Credits[/b][/u][/size][/font][/color]
The Unofficial Elder Scrolls Pages (or UESPWiki) and it\'s contributors
The Elder Scrolls Wiki and it\'s contributors
Oaristys for Modders Resource Pack - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16525/?
[color=#b22222][font=times new roman,times,serif][size=7][u][b]Feedback[/b][/u][/size][/font][/color]
I am treating this a WIP even though it is a complete mod, just because I enjoy playing around with statics so expect more screens to come in future updates.  Feel free to give me some ideas of what to add for others screens.
Leave bug reports, suggestions, ideas, etc. in the comments on my mod page. Thanks and enjoy :D
author: Ironman5000
